title: Bitcoin Queen | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 3
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 


This episode Chris breaks down Bitcoin and why it's a great time to invest, it's the HomelessPimp's birthday, Chris explains what he would do if he was Whitney Houston for a day, Clubhouse is addicting, Chris tells a story about selling off his old apartment and Vinny's tia had a heart attack!, Chris gets a delivery live on air, bad haircuts are the worst, Shout out Tank Sinatra, Anxiety Tuesday this week is all about Transcendental Meditation, and Christory Distefano is about Hannibal Barca who was a Carthaginian general and one of the first black generals in history!


Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! 


patreon.com/chrisdcomedy 


 


CHRISDCOMEDY.COM for all upcoming live comedy show dates 


FOLLOW Chris Distefano On Social Media 


Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/​


Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy​



Follow Chris' podcast with Sal Vulcano called HEY BABE! 


https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​


​


Filmed and Edited by 


THEHOMELESSPIMP https://www.instagram.com/thehomeless...​
